name: Shout Bot
description: A Discord bot for being LOUD.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token for your bot from https://discordapp.com/developers (used to communicate with Discord).

CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID for your bot from https://discordapp.com/developers (used to generate the bot's invite link).

PORT.description: Port to run the web server to display the instructions webpage.  Default value is 3000 (port used by Heroku for web traffic).
